replies.body:
Hello! Was seriously some great entries.  To acknowledge the efforts of the artists, I've tried commenting on each piece I saw in the office...


Koonu, your composition and color for mood is spot on.  I also love the use of light for dramatic effect.

Cressel, great job on the lighting and warm colors! I can almost feel the warmth of the fireplace in front of them

Six, wanted to acknowledge your lighting!  And the color details in Lux's hair - very subtle, and very effective

Vanishment, enjoyed your exploration of medium with pencils and watercolour 

CrimsonSeal, you're use of dark and light was very effective in capturing the mood and directing the viewer's eye

Rappel, loved you're effort on the ice/snow landscape - the subtle colors add so much more interest than just white snow!

Konoumin, loved your treatment of the character's outline catching a subtle amount of light!

Hyoton, love the glowing effect you achieved

Ezreai, great job of capturing the terror of Vayne's victim and creating it as a secondary focal point

Spoopychocolet, appreciate the effort you made to provide a background that sets the stage.  The environment is just as important as the characters when telling a story or capturing a moment.

Khronix, enjoyed the 'movie poster' feel you've created for your piece.  the line art and the outline is very effective and compliments Vayne

Archsage, kudos on experimenting with perspective and attempting a "first-person" view for your piece!

Somet1mes,  Great effort!

ChiefMagic, your effort on Garen's face is worth it - heavily communicates the emotion of your piece

Xynn, loved your vivid colors!  Your trees and water were particularly successful

TinKalzetin, Nod to your effort on perspective, particularly your care in depicting Garen's sword

Bitr, well done on achieving a sense of motion and movement with your magical elements in your piece

Cjjayme, The emotion of your piece is felt immediately.  Well done.

Nodametelsa, enjoyed your color choices.  The blues, greys, reds, and purples compliment each other very well.

Alphy, enjoyed the 'comic book' feel of your piece

Wacalac,  well done! color, composition, lighting, emotion... you nailed it.

Hide, excellent effort on the armour!  The metallic effect you created was very successful, particularly on the hip/leg piece.

Biglittleme, your effort on Galio's texture is so good - unmistakably stone/concrete

Alpacalyn, excellent work on the emotive eyes of Lux in your piece

Natella princess, appreciated your effort in creating a low-lit environment with a sharp light source

Cheesewoo, ugh, so good! loved the sky background you created and the effort in the textures of Galio - that metal crown is so good!

Loughlin, a refreshing choice of medium!

Kevinsong154, loved your composition and scene choice

TriggR, love the sense of movement your piece has, reminds me of watching dragon ball z :)

Cycronebro, good effort challenging yourself

Zookie, great effort (and achievement) on the moonlight!

Shockal, very much enjoyed the line art showcased here - very clean and purposeful

RobinHoot, excellent shading, and there is something I love about your little Lux :)

HooDingy, interesting art style.  I don't know if the shading complimented your line art.  I'd continue experimenting though!

ASCubeY,  love the textures and thatching in this piece

Whizza, just beautiful.  I don't know what else to say :)

Selathiel, really enjoy the fee4l of this.  Could literally be a frame in an A-level animation piece

Timestrike1, interesting angle and perspective you've chosen.  More details on landscape would help the viewer to digest what they are looking at.

Defqor, I enjoyed your take on the speech bubble for Garen - appreciate the extra flavour!



Much love guys,  seriously some great work!

I'm amazed at how the entries have really brought to life the related lore. It makes me more interested in League lore :D

Thank you to everyone that put in the time to draw something! I hope everyone checks out [all the other entries](http://imgur.com/a/Hw24R) as well :)

My fave entry was Whizza. Really liked the style, colouring and the image of Galio + Lux <3
Thanks yo :)  Ezreai was my favourite.
Alphys one is my fave lol reading the caption "The widow’s eyes rolled back into her head. She collapsed to the floor like a bag of stones. " then I looked at the widows face haha it made my day.

Hello! Alphy here!!! 

Thank you so much on what you said about my work <3 this was the biggest challenge I've ever drawn in my life. I don't tend to draw such dark pieces so this was really fun to do! So glad it made you laugh
Np :) keep it up man
Thank you so much! This comp was a big step for me since I never draw a dark theme! Your comment is appreciated <3
Agreed, Whizza's artwork was my favourite.{{champion:3}}
Well deserved win guys. Isn't wacalac the guy that makes those league poster fanart?
Your art is insane! Do you have a deviantart? I would love to see more art
Ayeee thanks dude! wasnt exactly too proud of this one I swear it looked more epic in my head lol http://korruptedsky.deviantart.com/ here ya go :P
super cool, maybe next time I should get everyone to post their deviant art or art page.

Wow dudes congratulations to everyone who won. All the artworks were well drawn.
Super honored to be chosen as a winner!
{{sticker:sg-lux}} love this soooooo much i main {{champion:99}} so i love the art i am inpressed keep it up and as Lux would say never stop smiling
Damn we have some quality Fan arts here {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Awesome guys!
Congratulations =D
Great Work Guys! As a Quinn main I particularly took a liking to both of them keep up the good work! Would it be alright if I was to use one as my wallpaper?

Congrats to everyone and the three winners!
I wonder if there will be more contests like this? They were really enjoyable. Hopefully I'll improve by then so i can produce better art for the contest! :)
Congrats to the winners! Those artworks are absolutely incredible.

The other other artworks are amazing, I'm surprised I made honorable mentions.
Good job!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
